resources.string: Status: Data is being collected about what you have installed on your device.
Status: Data is being collected about what you have previously used your phone for.
Please press on the READ QR-CODE button to scan a QR-Code associated with the study.
The only remaining step is to send the data to the researcher by email. Do you wish to send the data now?
There was a problem reading the QR-Code. Please scan the code again.

Much effort has gone into securing the data that this app collects. Ultimately, you have full control of your data, in that it will not be shared without you explicitly emailing/exporting the data. \n\nHowever, if your phone is rooted (jail-broken) or if you believe that the normal Android security on your phone is compromised, do not participate in this study.
In order to participate, you will need to grant the following permissions:
After granting them, click on the back arrow at the top or bottom of the screen until you return to this app.
To configure this app for the study you are participating in, a QR-Code needs to be scanned. Please allow the app to access the phone\'s camera.

The study you are taking part in needs you to grant \"usage\" permissions.\n\nThis allows the app to collect information about what you have used your phone for, currently, and previously, and when the screen has been on or off.
The study you are taking part in needs you to grant permissions for \"notifications\".\n\nThis means the app will collect information about when you receive and when you delete notifications.
Thank you! All essential permissions have been given.
This app is has been developed for research purposes. If you are not participating in a research study, please uninstall this app now.

This app helps researchers to know what you are using your phone for. Please do not use this app for any other purposes.\n\nIf you have been asked to use this app for purposes unrelated to scientific research then please uninstall it now. At this point no data has been collected.
The QR-Code that you previously scanned has configured this app to collect certain types of data, as follows:
• When the screen is off or on.
• What apps you use and when.
• When you install or delete an app.
• When the screen was on or off.
• When and what apps were used.

While no information is collected on what you did with the apps, inferences might be made. Press OK if you are happy that this data will be collected. If not, please contact the researcher and consider withdrawing from the study.
